title: Board emotes
body: I was looking at the champ/spell/item emotes that are in the league boards when i noticed there are many duplicates of 2 emotes. I'm not sure if these are intentional but things like {{summoner:51}}  {{summoner:35}} {{item:2424}} {{item:3513}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3633}} {{item:3048}} {{item:2420}} are repeated. Some things also have the wrong picture like {{item:3673}} which is enchantment: runic echoes.
